level.text: The purpose of this chapter is to establish the standards under which managed care providers that are to be paid on a fixed, prepaid, capitated basis may qualify to participate as managed care providers serving District residents who are AFDC and AFDC-related Medicaid recipients.

Only prepaid, capitated providers that meet the criteria in these standards shall qualify to provide services to District residents who are AFDC and AFDC-related Medicaid recipients as managed care providers.

Prepaid capitated providers applying to provide services to AFDC and AFDC-related Medicaid recipients under this chapter shall not be subject to the standards in Chapter 55 of Title 22 regarding prepaid providers serving other categories of Medicaid recipients.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is D.C. Code, 2001 Ed. §1-307.02; and Mayor’s Order 93 -218.
